title: The Building of Boulder Dam
creator_credit: Dowling and Brownell, International Harvester, Pat Dowling and Hobart Brownell
brief_description: Shows details of the building of the great structure that dammed the Colorado River forming an extensive lake. Varied activities, incidental to the building of the dam are woven into the story of the film.
creator_credit_for_label: Dowling and Brownell, International Harvester, Pat Dowling and Hobart Brownell
description: Shows details of the building of the great structure that dammed the Colorado River forming an extensive lake. Varied activities, incidental to the building of the dam are woven into the story of the film.
